LanguageData.VCE_SushiPrepTable.label: sushi prep table
LanguageData.VCE_SushiPrepTable.description: A working table to cut, slice and prepare all kinds of sushi.
LanguageData.VCE_SoyFermenter.label: soy sauce fermenter
LanguageData.VCE_SoyFermenter.description: A soy fermenter is a cilindrical, metallic drum where soybeans are pressed, mixed with aspergillus bacteria and grain, and aged for long time periods. The result is soy sauce of increasing quality, which can be used as a food condiment.
